definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: Any of various Old World freshwater fishes of the genus Barbus or Puntius and related genera.
sentences.chinese: 一种东半球鲃属或须鲃属及有关科属的淡水鱼类。

sentences.english: Any of various Old World freshwater fishes of the genus Barbus or Puntius and related genera.
sentences.chinese: 一种东半球鲃属或须鲃属及有关科属的淡水鱼类。

sentences.english: B. Man can swim like fish.
Any of various small freshwater fishes of the family Cyprinidae, which also includes carps and minnows.
sentences.chinese: 一种东半球鲃属或须鲃属及有关科属的淡水鱼类。

sentences.english: Any of various small freshwater fishes of the family Cyprinidae, which also includes carps and minnows.
sentences.chinese: 一种东半球鲃属或须鲃属及有关科属的淡水鱼类。

sentences.english: B. Former inmates are no more likely to commit crimes than are members of the general population.
sentences.chinese: 当局没有四须鲃以前更容易立功比普通人群的。

sentences.english: This tranquil world is home to specialised cave fishes, like the eyeless Golden Barb.
sentences.chinese: 这静谧的世界是穴居鱼的家，比如无目金鲃。

definition: a kind of shad with a head like a sturgeon
